title: Artificial Intelligence Hits The Grid As Utilities Race To Keep Up
description: Utilities like National Grid, Duke Energy, and AES are investing in AI to modernize grids, improve reliability, and prepare for electrification growth.
content: Duke Energy didn’t turn to artificial intelligence to chase the latest tech trend. It shifted to AI because every storm season now tests grid resilience. In 2024, the utility’s investment arm backed AiDash, a startup using high-resolution satellite i... [5045 chars]

title: BoE's Bailey: Risk of AI bubble if markets over price returns
description: LONDON (Reuters) -Bank of England Governor Andrew Bailey said on Thursday there could be an artificial intelligence-induced bubble in markets, notwithstanding the large productivity boost the technology would likely deliver.
content:

title: Datadog forecasts strong fourth-quarter earnings on AI-driven security demand

title: Denver startup Ownli to use AI to buy, sell homes
description: Ownli, a Denver tech startup, is racing to get an early start in deploying artificial intelligence and machine learning to replace the tasks that real estate agents have long handled.

title: EPAM raises 2025 forecasts on strong IT services spending
description: (Reuters) -EPAM Systems raised its annual earnings forecast for the third time this year as businesses spend more to modernize their systems for artificial intelligence, sending shares of the IT consultancy firm 4% higher in premarket trading on Thursday.
